events.message: I would like to request a refund for the jacket I purchased last week because it did not fit as expected and I no longer want to keep it.
The case has been classified under the Refund cluster due to the customer's request for money back on a recent purchase.
Customer support representative Sarah has been assigned to handle this refund request case.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you’d like a refund for your jacket. I’m here to help you with the process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been returned to the store or shipped back to us already?
Sure, my order number is 789654123. I have not sent the jacket back yet but I plan to drop it off at the nearest outlet by tomorrow.
Thank you for the info. Once we receive the returned jacket, we will process your refund within 5 business days and notify you via email.
That sounds good, thank you for the quick response and clear instructions on how to proceed with the refund.
We have now marked your refund case as resolved pending receipt of the jacket. Please keep the return receipt for your records.
Just checking in to confirm if you have sent back the jacket and to see if you received your refund as expected.
Yes, I returned the jacket last week and I received the full refund yesterday. Thanks again for your help!
We are glad your refund was processed successfully. The case is now closed. Have a great day!
Please take a moment to complete our customer satisfaction survey about your refund experience.
